amendment.description: Amendment allows for the continued U.S. participation in and contributions to the World Bank's International Development Association, the Asian Development Fund and the African Development Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section at the end of the bill providing for participation in the thirteenth replenishment of the resources of the international development association.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggert amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
